scripts.docker:local: npm run docker:envs && npm run docker:set-local-command && npm run docker:local:compose-up
scripts.docker:local:dev: npm run docker:envs && npm run docker:set-local-dev-command && npm run docker:local:compose-up
scripts.docker:populate-db: docker exec greenpress_greenpress_1 npm run populate-db
scripts.docker:envs: npm run docker:create-env && npm run docker:create-local-env
scripts.docker:create-env: node -e "const {existsSync, writeFileSync:write, readFileSync:read}=require('fs');const envPath='compose/.env';existsSync(envPath) ? process.exit() : write(envPath, read('compose/.env.example'))"
scripts.docker:local:compose-up: cd compose && docker-compose -f docker-compose.local.yml -p greenpress up --build -d
